answers.answer: I had a glucose test at 25 weeks (I'm now 26 weeks) as high risk as my mums side of family have diabetes, I wasn't allowed to eat after 10 Pm I was only allowed water till my 8 o'clock appointment had to wait two hours before going home as they do.blood test first give u fluid to drink then 2 hours later do another to see how ur body reacts after not herd copes with sugar up to the few days before I was worried in wot i was gunna eat etc but I thought I can't stop wot i normally eat I like chocolate and all sorts and mine come bk normal don't worry ur self too much as it's just precaution I'm sure u will b fine xx

Thank you. My family has no history or diabetes but I am over weight and at a high risk for high blood pressure because I get high blood pressure on birth control with estrogen. (Bp closer to 110/65 normally). For this one my appointment isn't until 2 Bu they said I can eat just nothing with high sugar.

question: Because I am high risk I have to do the first glucose screening at 12 weeks. I eat well usually but they have me so scared about being high risk and this being my first pregnancy I dont know what to think.
title: early one hour glucose screening.
